Unfortunately (1,0) is currently occupied by my own body segment, so on paper every move kills me, but there’s no other legal direction, so I’m forced to keep pressing toward the apples in hopes the segment configuration shifts in my favor.

Plan: once the tail moves I’ll continue sweeping right along y=0 and clear the remaining bottom apples before Snake #0 can trim my path.
